# Test Branch Names for Stop-Hook Context Tests
# Each line is a branch name pattern to test

# Standard patterns with issue numbers
feature-#123-authentication
feature-#456-add-user-profile
feature-#789-implement-api

# Issue at start
#100-create-dashboard
#200-fix-bug

# Issue at end
refactor-code-#300
update-deps-#400

# Multiple issues (should extract first)
feature-#500-and-#600-combined

# No issue patterns
feature-no-issue
refactor-hooks
update-documentation
main
master

# Edge cases
feature-#0-zero-issue
feature-#999999-large-number
#1-minimal
